ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and the earth with its splitting seeds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And the earth which opens up (with verdure),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and by the earth ever bursting with verdure,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And by oath of the earth which flourishes with it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the earth which splitteth (with the growth of trees and plants)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: by the earth cracking open with new growth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And by the earth which splitteth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And by the Earth which opens out (for the gushing of springs or the sprouting of vegetation),-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And the earth which splits (with the growth of trees and plants),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and by the earth bursting with vegetation;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And the earth that cracks open.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [by] the earth which cracks open,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [86:12] and [by] the earth of fissures, splitting with [the growth of] vegetation,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And the earth which splitteth (with the growth of trees and plants)) and it is also said this means: and by the earth which has firm pillars
